Package android.nfc

Provides access to Near Field Communication (NFC) functionality, allowing applications to read NDEF message in NFC tags. A "tag" may actually be another device that appears as a tag.

For more information, see the Near Field Communication guide.

Here's a summary of the classes:

NfcManager
This is the high level manager, used to obtain this device's NfcAdapter. You can acquire an instance using android.content.Context#getSystemService.
NfcAdapter
This represents the device's NFC adapter, which is your entry-point to performing NFC operations. You can acquire an instance with NfcManager.getDefaultAdapter(), or android.nfc.NfcAdapter#getDefaultAdapter(android.content.Context).
NdefMessage
Represents an NDEF data message, which is the standard format in which "records" carrying data are transmitted between devices and tags. Your application can receive these messages from an NfcAdapter.ACTION_TAG_DISCOVERED intent.
NdefRecord
Represents a record, which is delivered in a NdefMessage and describes the type of data being shared and carries the data itself.

Note: Not all Android-powered devices provide NFC functionality.

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NfcAdapter.ControllerAlwaysOnListener
    A listener to be invoked when NFC controller always on state changes.
    NfcAdapter.CreateBeamUrisCallback Deprecated.
    this feature is deprecated.
    NfcAdapter.CreateNdefMessageCallback Deprecated.
    this feature is deprecated.
    NfcAdapter.NfcUnlockHandler
    A callback to be invoked when an application has registered as a handler to unlock the device given an NFC tag at the lockscreen.
    NfcAdapter.OnNdefPushCompleteCallback Deprecated.
    this feature is deprecated.
    NfcAdapter.OnTagRemovedListener
    A callback that is invoked when a tag is removed from the field.
    NfcAdapter.ReaderCallback
    A callback to be invoked when the system finds a tag while the foreground activity is operating in reader mode.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApduList  
    AvailableNfcAntenna
    Represents a single available Nfc antenna on an Android device.
    BeamShareData
    Class to IPC data to be shared over Android Beam.
    ErrorCodes
    This class defines all the error codes that can be returned by the service and producing an exception on the application level.
    NdefMessage
    Represents an immutable NDEF Message.
    NdefRecord
    Represents an immutable NDEF Record.
    NfcActivityManager
    Manages NFC API's that are coupled to the life-cycle of an Activity.
    NfcAdapter
    Represents the local NFC adapter.
    NfcAntennaInfo
    Contains information on all available Nfc antennas on an Android device as well as information on the device itself in relation positioning of the antennas.
    NfcControllerAlwaysOnListener  
    NfcEvent
    Wraps information associated with any NFC event.
    NfcFrameworkInitializer
    Class for performing registration for Nfc service.
    NfcManager
    High level manager used to obtain an instance of an NfcAdapter.
    NfcServiceManager
    Provides a way to register and obtain the system service binder objects managed by the nfc service.
    NfcServiceManager.ServiceNotFoundException
    See NfcServiceManager.ServiceRegisterer.getOrThrow().
    NfcServiceManager.ServiceRegisterer
    A class that exposes the methods to register and obtain each system service.
    Tag
    Represents an NFC tag that has been discovered.
    TechListParcel  
    TransceiveResult
    Class used to pipe transceive result from the NFC service.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FormatException  
    TagLostException  
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    NfcAdapter.TagIntentAppPreferenceResult
    Possible response codes from NfcAdapter.setTagIntentAppPreferenceForUser(int, java.lang.String, boolean).
